titles.title: Urging the expedient relocation of the United States Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
9/25/2008--Introduced. Reaffirms that Jerusalem is the undivided capital of Israel.
Calls upon the President to fully implement the Jerusalem Embassy Act of 1995 and immediately begin to relocate the U.S. Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem.
